#summary Defines file types and their poperties.
#labels Description-File

= Introduction =

Defines file types and their poperties.

= Settings =

|| Identifier || string || The Identifier ||
|| BasedOn || string || Is it based on a different file type. ||
|| Extensions || array || possible extensions  ||
|| MagicWord || array ||  ||
|| ComputerLanguage || string ||  ||
|| Language || string ||  ||
|| IsExecutable || bool ||  ||
|| IncludeInIndex || bool ||  ||


= Example =

This is Ruby's definition. Copied from _/Developer/Library/PrivateFrameworks/DevToolsCore.framework/Versions/A/Resources/Standard file types.pbfilespec_
{{{
(
	{
            Identifier = text.script.ruby;
            BasedOn = text.script;
            Extensions = ( rb, rbw );
            MagicWord = (
                "#!/bin/ruby", 
                "#! /bin/ruby", 
                "#!/usr/bin/ruby", 
                "#! /usr/bin/ruby", 
                "#!/usr/local/bin/ruby", 
                "#! /usr/local/bin/ruby"
             );
            ComputerLanguage = shell.ruby;
            Language = "xcode.lang.ruby";
            IsExecutable = YES;
        },
)
}}}
